Step 1-2:
```{r}
# vectors for each team member's information
name <- c("Thibaut Jombart", "Dean Attali", "Anne Cori")
img <- c(
  "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Watts-College/paf-514-template/main/labs/images/avatar-01.png",
  "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Watts-College/paf-514-template/main/labs/images/avatar-02.png",
  "https://raw.githubusercontent.com/Watts-College/paf-514-template/main/labs/images/avatar-03.png"
)
desc <- c(
  "Founder of RECON. Statistician and R programmer specialized in outbreaks.",
  "Web and R developer, designer of the RECON website.",
  "Epidemiologist and R developer working on disease transmission models."
)
website <- c(
  "https://sites.google.com/site/thibautjombart/",
  "http://deanattali.com/",
  "https://www.imperial.ac.uk/people/a.cori"
)
github <- c(
  "https://github.com/thibautjombart/",
  "https://github.com/daattali/",
  "https://github.com/acori"
)
twitter <- c(
  "https://twitter.com/TeebzR",
  "https://twitter.com/daattali",
  ""
)

# data frame
dat <- data.frame(NAME = name, IMG = img, DESC = desc, WEBSITE = website, 
                  GITHUB = github, TWITTER = twitter, stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

print(dat)

```


Step 3:
```{r}
# Load FontAwesome icons
if (!require("fontawesome")) install.packages("fontawesome", repos="http://cran.us.r-project.org")
library(fontawesome)

# HTML profile section
build_circle <- function(WEBSITE, IMG, NAME, DESC, GITHUB, TWITTER) {
  
  #FontAwesome icons
  fa_home <- fontawesome::fa(name = "home")
  fa_github <- fontawesome::fa(name = "github")
  fa_twitter <- fontawesome::fa(name = "twitter")
  
  # profile container
  cat('<div class="list-circles-item">\n')

  # profile image 
  cat(paste0('  <a href="', WEBSITE, '"><img src="', IMG, '" class="item-img"></a>\n'))

  # name and description
  cat(paste0('  <h4 class="item-name">', NAME, '</h4>\n'))
  cat(paste0('  <div class="item-desc">', DESC, '</div>\n'))

  # Links container
  cat('  <div class="item-links">\n')

  # Website link
  if (WEBSITE != "") {
    cat(paste0('    <a class="item-link" href="', WEBSITE, '" title="Website">', fa_home, '</a>\n'))
  }

  # GitHub link
  if (GITHUB != "") {
    cat(paste0('    <a class="item-link" href="', GITHUB, '" title="GitHub">', fa_github, '</a>\n'))
  }

  # Twitter link
  if (TWITTER != "") {
    cat(paste0('    <a class="item-link" href="', TWITTER, '" title="Twitter">', fa_twitter, '</a>\n'))
  }

  # Close tags
  cat('  </div>\n')
  cat('</div>\n')
}


```

Step 4:

```{r}
# team member gallery
cat('<div class="list-circles">\n')

# Loop each row
for (i in 1:nrow(dat)) {
  build_circle(
    WEBSITE = dat$WEBSITE[i],
    IMG = dat$IMG[i],
    NAME = dat$NAME[i],
    DESC = dat$DESC[i],
    GITHUB = dat$GITHUB[i],
    TWITTER = dat$TWITTER[i]
  )
}

cat('</div>\n')

```
